channel.title: How do I make Objects and Items Spawn/Respawn [Bulby 508]
channel.description:
How do I make items spawn and respawn on the ground... I am running a 508 with the bulby format or something (I know its a 508 server, and it uses bulby)
Thanks Hihid27

io -> packets -> ObjectOption1.java

Look for what’s there, copy it, and change the ID.

item.description:

is there a way to make the objects that come up as “unhandeled object1” do stuff?
for example: I try to open a door (doesn’t do anything)
Server says Unhandeled Object1 [Object Id]

thanks

item.dc:creator: @hihid27 hihid27

item.source: How do I make Objects and Items Spawn/Respawn [Bulby 508]

item.title: How do I make Objects and Items Spawn/Respawn [Bulby 508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Objects too? What do you mean.

For 508, the item spawnings are in DropItem.java

You will need to add a timer into ‘Engine.java’ so that it knows when to respawn, and when the timer goes off you call the ‘DropItem’ method.

Read full topic
